elements.title: Family trust
elements.subtitle: You have a Family Trust or Self-Managed Superannuation Fund.

elements.title: Huge inheritance
elements.subtitle: You are giving one of your beneficiaries an inheritance of more than $500k and you want them to receive their inheritance in a tax effective way.

elements.title: Reduced proportion
elements.subtitle: You are cutting out (or giving only a reduced proportion to) a child, spouse or dependent.

elements.title: Dependent with problems
elements.subtitle: You have a child, spouse or dependent who is not good with money or who has a drug or alcohol problem.

elements.title: 'Gold-digger' relation
elements.subtitle: You have a child, spouse or dependent who might marry someone who is a ‘gold-digger’, who is bad with money or who has a drug or alcohol problem.

elements.title: Trust with disability
elements.subtitle: You want to set up a trust for someone with a disability.

elements.title: Tax effective way
elements.subtitle: You want to make sure that your superannuation is passed on in the most tax effective way.

elements.title: Part owners
elements.subtitle: You, or a company or trust that you own, are the part owner of a business.
